Name: Blood Orange Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Fresh blood orange with a subtle gin backbone, bittersweet herbal notes and vermouth complexity.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2008 by Jeffrey Morgenthaler at Bel Ami Lounge in Oregon, USA. The optional addition of a barspoon (5ml) amaretto is thanks to a suggestion by Tibor Szentirmai, a fellow Discerning Drinker.
Nutrition: One serving of Blood Orange Cocktail contains 196 calories
